name: Brutaltech
description:
"I did it! I finally made it out of the city! I'm almost there, I can't wait to see you again..."

Brutaltech is an exploration first-person game set in the far future in a cold, abandoned forest near a city ruled by a corrupted leader. Disable all of the security terminals to escape the cities limits to reunite with your loved one.. but the forest is not always as it seems.

Join the discord page for future games and updates: https://discord.gg/nUPtpeJT7d
